glosses: The name of the Latin script letter D/d.

examples.translation: Özer also knows the answer of the question.
Berker is coming with us as well.
Utku likes eating ice cream, too.

examples.text: Herkes iddia ediyor ki boyum uzamış da ben fark etmiyorum.
examples.translation: Everyone claims that I've gotten taller however I don't really notice it.
